mapper.select: select prof_tb.prof_id, prof_name, prof_img, prof_email, prof_tel, prof_education, prof_career, depart_name, group_concat(sub_name SEPARATOR ', ') as sub_name from professor_tb prof_tb join department_tb depart_tb on depart_tb.depart_id = prof_tb.depart_id join subject_tb sub_id on sub_id.prof_id = prof_tb.prof_id where prof_tb.prof_id = #{prof_id} group by prof_id
